scripts.install:all: cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "bun run start:backend" "bun run start:frontend"
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
